response.overview: A 12 year old girl struggling in the foster care system and with the bigger, more complicated questions in life, tries to navigate the battle that this world brings down on her. Even though people surround her, she feels more alone than ever. A heartbreaking and inspiring experience of survival, loss, and perseverance through misery and grief. Wondering, will anything ever be permanent?
response.tagline: Moving takes strength, strength takes faith.
response.title: Someone To Believe In
